Name: Timaeus
Title: Timaeus, Scholar of Alchemy
Desc: "Hello there... Oh, you'd like to use the Crafting Bench? Sure, be my guest."
Source: Reward for accepting Timaeus' Adventure Challenge in the open world and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

Talent.Name: Timaeus
Talent.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When played: </color>Comes with 2 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Transmutation Materials</color>. If your deck originally includes at least 6 {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact cards, you will randomly also draw 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact Card from your deck.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> This card will gain 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Transmutation Material</color>.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>When playing an {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact Card:</color> If possible, spend <color=#FFFFFFFF>Transmutation Materials</color> equal to the total cost of the {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact and equip this {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact for free. (Once per Round)
